pages.text: Do you think that's everything in Immersive Engineering ?Nope that's not there are many things to do in IE so let's move on a Side Story Chapter -- Mother Of Miner -- The Excavator !!!! [needs 2048RF/t and tons of steels]

The first step, use the Core Sample Drill and your [Fully-Charged] capacitor and find a chunk have a mineral vein on your Sample, when you located that chunk it's time to build the Excavator in that same chunk

Required Materials:            x26 Steel Scaffolding          x15 Steel Sheetmetal           x9 Block of Steel              x1 Redstone Engineering Block x9 Light Engineering Block   x5 Heavy Engineering Block   x3 Radiator Block             Make sure to dig down a 9 blocks long , 3 blocks wide and deep 2 blocks hole before buiding it

pages.name: Excavator
pages.text: To form, right-click on the Heavy Engineering Block next to the Redstone Engineering Block face using Engineer's Hammer

pages.title: Power Inputs
pages.text: There are 3 powers inputs at the right side of the machine

pages.title: Item Outputs
pages.text: From here you can put some chests or some storable block in front of this hole
